title: Create BRAND Node
user_story:
As an API contributor\
I want to be able to create BRANDs\
So I can fill gaps in the database
description:
# **Response**

**Happy path**

* positive HTTP status code (201)
* a simple JSON with the ID and all core properties of the newly created node:
  * `id`: integer
  * `name`: string
  * `full_name`: string/null
  * `founded`: integer/null
  * `defunct`: integer/null
  * `wmi`: string/null
  * `hsn`: string/null
  * `created_at`: string
  * `updated_at`: string

**Unhappy path**

* negative HTTP status code (400, 422)
* a plain text response stating the problem

# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business Logic)**

* the node is not created in error case
  * 400 when syntactical error
  * 422 when semantical error
* an error message when the provided data was not valid
* the node is successfully created when provided with valid data
  * the response includes all properties, even when they are empty â†’ value is returned as `null` in this case
* unknown properties in the request are ignored (no error, no warning)

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* bulk create
* versioning information
* auth / security
* proper JSON structure according to the JSON:API
